Text: Will this be seeded at all, or should I just remove it?

Mother Warthog chronicles the hardships and the terrible odds she must face in order to try and raise her family to adulthood.

In Africa, the warthog is a constant target for hungry predators. Cheetah, Lion and Leopard actively hunt this prized delicacy.
Fewer than 40% of piglets ever see their first birthday. This year a warthog mother will face these terrible odds and try to raise her family to adulthood. She must learn from the lessons of her past and face her enemies with intelligence and determination? to be the Warthog: Mother of Courage.
